raiseActionButtons.title: Configuration option name for raising action buttons

revertDoneOption.title: Configuration option name for what to do after a rollback is completed

options.latest: Option to go to the latest revision's diff
options.message: Option to send the user a message
options.template: Option to send a quick template to the user

revertMethod.title: Configuration option name for the method of reversion to use
revertMethod.description: Text describing the configuration option, include the fact that mediawiki rollback requires the right but is faster

options.rollback: Option to use MediaWiki rollback (for rollbackers only)

noticeOrder.title: Configuration option name for the order of which warning templates are displayed

options.title: Option to sort by the title of the warning template
options.template: Option to sort by the template's name
